prompt: What function would you use to find the average low temperature from May 3 to May 10 in this spreadsheet?
description: The function AVERAGE gives you an average of a series of numbers or the numbers in cells. For example, =AVERAGE(3,5) will give you the average of the numbers 3 and 5, or =AVERAGE(A2:A6) will give you the average of cells A2 through A6.
feedback: The cells that show the average low temperature from May 3 to May 10 are the cells C4 through C11. The formula =AVERAGE(C4:C11) will find the average of all the numbers in cells C4 through C11 and will give you the average low temperature in the date range.
